0:
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Building initial output tree ..."
mdbook build --dest-dir /public /mdbook/book
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Watching for changes  ..."
mdbook watch --dest-dir /public /mdbook/book
dnf install -y chrony iputils dnsutils && chronyd -n -d

[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

MONITOR ups@network-ups-tools-app.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:3493 1 upsmon "bacon" slave
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

[upsmon]
  password  = "bacon"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master

[ups]
  driver = "usbhid-ups"
  port = "auto"
  vendorid = "051D"
  productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS NS 1500M2 FW:957.e4 .D USB FW:e4"
  vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  bus = "001"

MONITOR ups@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "bacon" master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
